pkgmetadata.longdescription: This provides a repo post-sync hook, /etc/portage/repo.postsync.d/rpi3-check-porthash, which will be activated iff the main gentoo repo is rsync'd to the rsync://isshoni.org/gentoo-portage-pi64 host; in this case, the repo's integrity will be checked via the signed repo.hash master hash, and the sync aborted with an error if it does not. This provides assurance that the repo has not been tampered with, despite the use of an unauthenticated transport (rsync).
